00044 /*! This class provides storage for the header of a GCOS DAT file. */
00045 class CDATFileHeaderData
00046 {
00047 public:
00048         /*! Constructor */
00049         CDATFileHeaderData();
00050 
00051         /*! Destructor */
00052         ~CDATFileHeaderData();
00053 
00054 protected:
00055         /*! The number of pixel columns. */
00056         int32_t m_nCols;
00057 
00058         /*! The number of pixel rows. */
00059         int32_t m_nRows;
00060 
00061         /*! The minimum pixel value. */
00062         uint16_t m_MinValue;
00063 
00064         /*! The maximum pixel value. */
00065         uint16_t m_MaxValue;
00066 
00067         /*! The grid coordinates. */
00068         GridCoordinatesType m_Grid;
00069 
00070         /*! The probe array type. */
00071         std::string m_ArrayType;
00072 
00073         /*! The scanner ID */
00074         std::string m_ScannerID;
00075 
00076 public:
00077         /*! Gets the number of pixel columns.
00078          * @return The number of pixel columns.
00079          */
00080         int32_t GetCols() const { return m_nCols; }
00081 
00082         /*! Sets the number of pixel columns.
00083          * @param cols The number of pixel columns.
00084          */
00085         void SetCols(int32_t cols) { m_nCols = cols; }
00086 
00087         /*! Gets the number of pixel rows.
00088          * @return The number of pixel rows.
00089          */
00090         int32_t GetRows() const { return m_nRows; }
00091 
00092         /*! Sets the number of pixel rows.
00093          * @param rows The number of pixel rows.
00094          */
00095         void SetRows(int32_t rows) { m_nRows = rows; }
00096 
00097         /*! Gets the minimum pixel value.
00098          * @return The minimum pixel value.
00099          */
00100         uint16_t GetMinValue() const { return m_MinValue; }
00101 
00102         /*! Sets the minimum pixel value.
00103          * @param val The minimum pixel value.
00104          */
00105         void SetMinValue(uint16_t val) { m_MinValue = val; }
00106 
00107         /*! Gets the maximum pixel value.
00108          * @return The maximum pixel value.
00109          */
00110         uint16_t GetMaxValue() const { return m_MaxValue; }
00111 
00112         /*! Sets the maximum pixel value.
00113          * @param val The maximum pixel value.
00114          */
00115         void SetMaxValue(uint16_t val) { m_MaxValue = val; }
00116 
00117         /*! Returns the total number of pixels.
00118          * @return The total number of pixels.
00119          */
00120         int32_t GetNumPixels() const { return m_nCols * m_nRows; }
00121 
00122         /*! Gets the grid coordinates.
00123          * @return The grid coordinates.
00124          */
00125         const GridCoordinatesType &GetGridCorners() { return m_Grid; }
00126 
00127         /*! Sets the grid coordinates.
00128          * @param grid The grid coordinates.
00129          */
00130         void SetGridCorners(const GridCoordinatesType &grid) { m_Grid = grid; }
00131 
00132         /*! Gets the probe array type.
00133          * @return The probe array type.
00134          */
00135         std::string GetArrayType() const { return m_ArrayType; }
00136 
00137         /*! Sets the array type.
00138          * @param arrayType The probe array type.
00139          */
00140         void SetArrayType(const char *arrayType) { m_ArrayType = arrayType; }
00141 
00142         /*! Gets the scanner ID.
00143          * @return The scanner ID.
00144          */
00145         std::string GetScannerID() const { return m_ScannerID; }
00146 
00147         /*! Sets the array type.
00148          * @param scannerID The scanner ID.
00149          */
00150         void SetScannerID(const char *scannerID) { m_ScannerID = scannerID; }
00151 };

00155 /*! This class provides parsing and access interfaces to a GCOS DAT file. */
00156 class CDATFileData  
00157 {
00158 public:
00159         /*! Constructor */
00160         CDATFileData();
00161 
00162         /*! Destructor */
00163         ~CDATFileData();
00164 
00165 protected:
00166         /*! The full path of the DAT file. */
00167         std::string m_FileName;
00168 
00169         /*! The DAT file header */
00170         CDATFileHeaderData m_HeaderData;
00171 
00172         /*! The file handle. */
00173         std::ifstream m_File;
00174 
00175 public:
00176         /*! Sets the full path of the DAT file.
00177          * @param str The full path of the DAT file.
00178          */
00179         void SetFileName(const char *str) { m_FileName = str; }
00180 
00181         /*! Gets the full path of the DAT file.
00182          * @return The full path of the DAT file.
00183          */
00184         std::string GetFileName() const { return m_FileName; }
00185 
00186         /*! Gets the DAT file header object.
00187          * @return The header.
00188          */
00189         CDATFileHeaderData &GetHeader() { return m_HeaderData; }
00190 
00191         /*! Gets row of data.
00192          * @param rowIndex The index to the row to extract.
00193          * @param pixels An array to store the pixel data.
00194          */
00195         void GetPixels(int rowIndex, uint16_t *pixels);
00196 
00197         /*! Gets row of data.
00198          * @param rowIndex The index to the row to extract.
00199          * @param rowCount The number of rows to extract.
00200          * @param pixels An array to store the pixel data.
00201          */
00202         void GetPixels(int rowIndex, int rowCount, uint16_t *pixels);
00203 
00204         /*! Gets a single pixel value.
00205          * @param x The x coordinate.
00206          * @param y The y coordinate.
00207          * @return The pixel value at the coordinate.
00208          */
00209         uint16_t GetPixel(int x, int y);
00210 
00211         /*! Checks if the file exists.
00212          * @return True if exists.
00213          */
00214         bool Exists();
00215 
00216         /*! Reads the file.
00217          * @return True if successful.
00218          */
00219         bool Read();
00220 
00221         /*! Closes the file when finished accessing it. */
00222         void Close();
00223 
00224         /*! Update the grid coordinates in a DAT file.
00225          * @param datFile The full path name of the DAT file to update.
00226          * @param grid The new grid coordinates.
00227          * @return True if successful.
00228          */
00229         static bool UpdateGridCorners(const char *datFile, const GridCoordinatesType &grid);
00230 
00231         /*! Determines if the file is a GCOS DAT file.
00232          * @param datFile The full path name of the DAT file to update.
00233          * @return True if the file is a GCOS DAT file.
00234          */
00235         static bool IsGCOSDATFile(const char *datFile);
00236 };
